headline: What American Water Works Company (AWK)'s Madison System Acquisition Means for Shareholders
summary: Illinois American Water, a subsidiary of American Water Works Company, recently completed its acquisition of the city of Madison’s wastewater collections system, adding approximately 1,500 customers in the Metro East area near St. Louis and committing over US$9 million in planned infrastructure improvements over five years. This move highlights American Water’s ongoing efforts to expand its regulated footprint through municipal system acquisitions and investments in water infrastructure...
